name: Crate Chaos (Future Games)
description:
Crate Chaos is a one-button game about demolishing crates. You work for Rainforest, a packaging and shipping company, loading crates off of a conveyor belt. But now you are fed up with your low pay and grueling job, and so you are rebelling. Press [SPACE] to push over boxes. Make sure you time it so your hands hit the box as it passes. See how many you can demolish in 30 seconds (or in 45 and 15 seconds, with version 2.1.0)!

Game designed by Flying Zucchini

Game programmed by flesheatindragon

Game graphics by flesheatindragon

Game music by flesheatindragon
